title: Morning Joe 8/3/21
description: Seventy percent of American adults have received at least one dose of a Covid-19 vaccine, officials said Monday, reaching a goal President Joe Biden had hoped to reach a month ago.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
